<NEW - WHEELIE>

Wheelie did not have an idea of what he was u=
p against, whether friend or foe.  At ths point, seeing it stare out, but n=
ot approach hi, and vanish back to the underbrush, he kept his energon good=
ies out and about.

SEeing it vanish and not being able to track it further=
, he put the goodies back in his storage unit, then carefully waited again =
adn listened to see if there were more of them, or he was alone again, in w=
hich case he would carefully move on then.
